SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ORDER A
JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
AND A.ORDER_CODE = #{searchValue}
AND (B.NAME = #{searchValue} OR B.PHONE_NUMBER LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')
AND A.ORDER_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND A.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND A.ORDER_DATE > TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND A.ORDER_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1

SELECT A.ORDER_CODE , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_REQUEST , A.ORDER_PRICE , A.ORDER_DISCOUNT , A.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE , A.MEMBER_NO , D.NAME , D.PHONE_NUMBER , A.INPUT_ZIP_CODE , A.ORDER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ORDER_CODE , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_REQUEST , B.ORDER_PRICE , B.ORDER_DISCOUNT , B.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE , B.MEMBER_NO , B.INPUT_ZIP_CODE , B.ORDER_STATUS FROM ( SELECT C.ORDER_CODE , C.ORDER_DATE , C.ORDER_REQUEST , C.ORDER_PRICE , C.ORDER_DISCOUNT , C.ORDER_TOTAL_PRICE , C.MEMBER_NO , C.INPUT_ZIP_CODE , C.ORDER_STATUS FROM TBL_ORDER C
JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON(C.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO)
AND C.ORDER_CODE = #{searchValue}
AND (D.NAME = #{searchValue} OR D.PHONE_NUMBER LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')
AND C.ORDER_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND C.ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND C.ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND C.ORDER_DATE > TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND C.ORDER_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
ORDER BY C.ORDER_CODE DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}
) A JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON (A.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{startRow} ORDER BY 1 DESC
